snippet: No longer painfully thin, Garrett Stutz has shown N.B.A. potential at Wichita State, which plays in the N.C.A.A. tournament Thursday.
abstract: Wichita State men's basketball center Garrett Stutz has shown NBA potential after gaining weight and conditioning his 7-foot-tall frame; Stutz is preparing with the team for the NCAA tournament.
lead_paragraph: No longer painfully thin, Garrett Stutz has shown N.B.A. potential at Wichita State, which plays in the N.C.A.A. tournament Thursday.

headline.seo: Center Garrett Stutz Grows Into a Force for Wichita State
headline.main: Center Bulks Up; Wichita St. Flexes Muscles
headline.print_headline: Center Bulks Up; Wichita St. Flexes Muscles
